Shroomish (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0284: Masquerain
Pokémon
#0286: Breloom →

Shroomish has been featured on 16 different cards since it debuted in the EX Ruby & Sapphire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Shroomish cards are normally Grass-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Shroomish

Shroomish
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Shroomish EX Ruby & Sapphire 69/109 ADV Expansion Pack 009/055
Shroomish EX Sandstorm 78/100 Latios ex Half Deck   004/018
Shroomish EX Deoxys 72/107 Clash of the Blue Sky 011/082
Shroomish EX Emerald 63/106 Grass Quick Construction Pack   003/015
Shroomish Secret Wonders 108/132 Shining Darkness  
Shroomish Supreme Victors 127/147 Beat of the Frontier 013/100
Shroomish Furious Fists 6/111 Rising Fist 006/096
Shroomish Primal Clash 15/160 Gaia Volcano 007/070
Shroomish Generations RC2/RC32 PokéKyun Collection 002/032
Shroomish Shining Legends 4/73 Shining Legends 005/072
Shroomish Unified Minds 5/236 Miracle Twin 004/094
Shroomish Fusion Strike 004/264 Fusion Arts 004/100
        Start Deck 100   008/414
Shroomish Brilliant Stars 003/172 Star Birth 003/100
Shroomish Scarlet & Violet 003/198 ex Starter Set Sprigatito & Lucario ex   001/023
Shroomish Temporal Forces 006/162 Cyber Judge 006/071
Shroomish Destined Rivals 005/182 Glory of the Rocket Gang 002/098


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
